ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Tranix Crown Disappointment.....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve already stated this.  If you re being demoted to second or third on certain items because other classes can use it better, then make your friends
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 13 Apr 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> I think this has become typical. Because there are very few items that
> truly scream Bard, I get to be second or third on every list.
> Unfortunately, second and third never come up. I have despaired of getting
> any rare items without soloing the mobs that carry them. Every group I'm in

I've already stated this. If you're being demoted to second
or third on certain items because other classes can use it
better, then make your friends aware that there are no items
that bards can use best (other than a couple instruments) and
ask to be promoted to first on other items to compensate.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
